duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform the full range and scope of dispatching duties, including maintaining field communications with public safety personnel with minimal guidance and supervision.
Receive emergency and non-emergency requests for law enforcement services and dispatch via radio, telephone, and other communications media.
Provide telecommunications support and incident coordination for field units.
Work shifts will rotate, and mandatory overtime may be required.

education_certification.credential: Possession of or ability to obtain a Dispatch Certificate from POST and completion of DOJ training for full access operator within one year of appointment.
